author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the apple, date and lemon juice into a bowl and mix together.  On a clean surface lay two sheets of filo pastry out alongside each other on a clean, flat surface. Brush with the egg and lay another sheet over each. Spoon a little of the fruit mixture into the middle of each sheet at one end. Roll up as you would a spring roll, whilst brushing with the egg so it sticks. Heat the oil in a deep saucepan until a breadcrumb sizzles in it (CAUTION: Hot oil can be dangerous do not leave unattended) and add the parcels and deep-fry until golden, then carefully remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper.  To serve, place the fruit roll onto a plate and drizzle with honey.
ingredients: ¼ Bramley apple, finely chopped ,  50g/2 oz dates, finely chopped,  ½ lemon, juice only,  4 sheets ready-made filo pastry,  1 free-range egg, beaten,  500ml/18fl oz vegetable oil,  2 tbsp honey, to drizzle
